nodes.text: The Erased were a group of people who did not want to be executed by the Galactic Empire for treason, so they erased all memory of their existence. They took refuge with Dexter Jettster in the underlevels of Coruscant. Their base was attacked by a group of stormtroopers, who killed most of the members. However, Oryon and Trever Flume were able to escape along with Solace and other members of the group.
